languages.text: {n}Друкари утробно смеется.{/n} "Я не жду от примитивных созданий осознавания того, что вам не по уму. Все, что мне нужно от тебя — понимание твоих обязательств".

{n}Marazhai lets out a low chuckle.{/n} "I do not expect a primitive creature such as you to understand something so beyond your intellect. All I need is for you to understand your obligations to me."
languages.original_text: {n}Друкари утробно смеется.{/n} "Я не жду от примитивных созданий осознавания того, что вам не по уму. Все, что мне нужно от тебя — понимание твоих обязательств".

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋低声笑了起来。{/n}“我并不指望像你这样的原始生物能理解超越你智力的东西，我只需要你明白你对我的义务就够了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai lets out a low chuckle.{/n} "I do not expect a primitive creature such as you to understand something so beyond your intellect. All I need is for you to understand your obligations to me."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋低声笑了起来。{/n}“我并不指望像你这样的原始生物能理解超越你智力的东西，我只需要你明白你对我的义务。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは低い声でクックと笑った。{/n}「お前ごときの原始生物が、その知性以上のものを理解できるとは思っていない。お前は義務を理解してくれさえいればいい」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai lets out a low chuckle.{/n} "I do not expect a primitive creature such as you to understand something so beyond your intellect. All I need is for you to understand your obligations to me."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは低い声でクックと笑った。{/n}「お前ごときの原始生物が、その知性以上のものを理解できるとは思っていない。お前は義務を理解してくれさえいればいい」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai deja escapar una risotada.{/n} «No esperaba que una criatura tan primitiva como tú comprendiese algo que escapa a tu intelecto. Lo único que has de comprender son tus obligaciones hacia mí».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai lets out a low chuckle.{/n} "I do not expect a primitive creature such as you to understand something so beyond your intellect. All I need is for you to understand your obligations to me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai deja escapar una risotada.{/n} «No esperaba que una criatura tan primitiva como tú comprendiese algo que escapa a tu intelecto. Lo único que has de comprender son tus obligaciones hacia mí».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai laisse échapper un ricanement grave.{/n} « Je ne m'attends pas à ce qu'une créature aussi primitive que vous saisisse ce qui dépasse son entendement. Tout ce que je vous demande, c'est de bien comprendre vos obligations envers moi. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai lets out a low chuckle.{/n} "I do not expect a primitive creature such as you to understand something so beyond your intellect. All I need is for you to understand your obligations to me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai laisse échapper un ricanement grave.{/n} « Je ne m'attends pas à ce qu'une créature aussi primitive que vous saisisse ce qui dépasse son entendement. Tout ce que je vous demande, c'est de bien comprendre vos obligations envers moi. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai kichert leise.{/n} "Mir ist ganz klar, dass eine primitive Kreatur wie Ihr kein Verständnis hat von Dingen, die Euren Intellekt derart übersteigen. Ich möchte nur, dass Ihr versteht, welche Verpflichtungen Ihr mir gegenüber habt."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai lets out a low chuckle.{/n} "I do not expect a primitive creature such as you to understand something so beyond your intellect. All I need is for you to understand your obligations to me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai kichert leise.{/n} "Mir ist ganz klar, dass eine primitive Kreatur wie Ihr kein Verständnis habt von Dingen, die Euren Intellekt übersteigen. Ich möchte nur, dass Ihr versteht, welche Verpflichtungen Ihr mir gegenüber habt."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai lets out a low chuckle.{/n} "I do not expect a primitive creature such as you to understand something so beyond your intellect. All I need is for you to understand your obligations to me."

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, pes bir sesle kıkırdıyor.{/n} "Senin gibi ilkel bir yaratığın algılarının çok ötesindeki bir şeyi kavrayabilmesini beklemiyorum. Senden kavramanı beklediğim tek şey, bana karşı olan yükümlülüklerin."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai lets out a low chuckle.{/n} "I do not expect a primitive creature such as you to understand something so beyond your intellect. All I need is for you to understand your obligations to me."
